definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="97" y="120"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_nbt_num_set" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="health"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block
